_aboutDescription: As a Full Stack developer specializing in data-driven solutions, my mission is to transform complex information into actionable insights and create robust and optimized digital experiences. With a solid foundation in both backend and frontend, I am passionate about the entire software development process, from planning to implementation and optimization of scalable systems. Over the past [2 years], I have been working on projects ranging from building efficient and scalable APIs, to implementing intuitive user interfaces. My approach combines data analysis and automation to optimize processes and ensure that each solution is aligned with business objectives.
